title: Commission Regulation (EC) No 1585/95 of 30 June 1995 amending Regulation (EEC) No 1725/79 on the rules for granting aid to skimmed milk processed into compound feedingstuffs and skimmed-milk powder intended for feed for calves
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EC) No 1585/95 of 30  June 1995 amending Regulation (EEC) No 1725/79 on the rules for granting aid to skimmed milk  processed into compound feedingstuffs and skimmed-milk powder intended for feed for calves
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: In Article 4 (1a) of Regulation (EEC) No 1725/79, the words 'between  1 February 1993 and 30 June 1995` are replaced by 'between 1 February 1993 and 31 December 1995`.

This Regulation shall enter into force on the day following its publication in the  Official Journal of the European Communities.
It shall apply from 1 July 1995.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all  Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 30 June 1995.
For the Commission Franz FISCHLER Member of the Commission
